DOC.HEADLINE: 1st LD: Chinese nationals kidnapped in Cameroon: Chinese Embassy

TEXT.P: Seven Chinese nationals working for a private fishing company were kidnapped off the Bakassi Peninsula in southwest Cameroon, Chinese Embassy in Cameroon confirmed on Saturday.
A group calling itself the "Africa Marine Commando" has claimed responsibility for the kidnapping, the embassy said.
The Chinese Embassy said it is trying its best to rescue the captives.
